export var dateStart=new Date(2022,1,5,5,55,30);// дата начала
export var convertToTwoDigit=function convertToTwoDigit(num){return num>9?String(num):"0".concat(num);};export var getDays=function getDays(ms){var days=Math.trunc(ms/(60000*60*24));return days;};export var getHours=function getHours(ms){var min=ms/60000;var days=Math.trunc(min/(60*24));var hours=Math.trunc((min-days*24*60)/60);return hours;};export var getMins=function getMins(ms){var min=ms/60000;var days=Math.trunc(min/(60*24));var hours=Math.trunc((min-days*24*60)/60);var minutes=Math.trunc(min-days*24*60-hours*60);return minutes;};export var getSecs=function getSecs(ms){var secs=ms/1000;var days=Math.trunc(secs/(60*60*24));var hours=Math.trunc((secs-days*24*60*60)/(60*60));var minutes=Math.trunc((secs-days*24*60*60-hours*60*60)/60);var seconds=Math.trunc(secs-days*24*60*60-hours*60*60-60*minutes);return seconds;};
